mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectComReqstAtchmnfl Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ COM_REQST_SN , ATCHMNFL_TURN , ATCH_FILE_NM , ATCH_FILE_URL , ATCH_FILE_CPCTY , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM COM_REQST_ATCHMNFL WHERE 1 = 1 AND COM_REQST_SN = #{comReqstSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND ATCHMNFL_TURN = #{atchmnflTurn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
